briefTitle: BEdtime Sublingual TNX-102 SL as Fibromyalgia Intervention Therapy (BESTFIT)
officialTitle: A Phase 2b, Double-Blind, Randomized, Multicenter, Placebo-Controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of TNX-102 SL Tablets Taken at Bedtime in Patients With Fibromyalgia
summary: TNX-102 capsules \[formerly known as very low dose (VLD) cyclobenzaprine\] at bedtime have shown promise as a treatment of fibromyalgia, but the drug required new formulation technology for bedtime use. The present trial was designed to assess the safety and efficacy of TNX-102 SL 2.8 mg tablets, taken daily at bedtime over 12 weeks to treat fibromyalgia.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline in Weekly Average of Daily Pain Scores at Week 12
